text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/CodeSystem/us-core-category
  • Include all codes defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/observation-category

name: USCoreSimpleObservationCategory
title: US Core Simple Observation Category
description: Used to classify the context of a survey, screening or assessment for simple observations and may be used to assist with indexing and searching for appropriate instances.
